name: EC2ContainerServiceTaskDefinitionContainerDefinitionsVolumesFrom
description: VolumesFrom is a property of the Amazon EC2 Container Service TaskDefinition ContainerDefinitions property that mounts data volumes from other containers.

properties.name: SourceContainer
properties.description: The name of the container that has the volumes to mount.

properties.name: ReadOnly
properties.description: Indicates whether the container can write to the volume. If you specify true, the container has read-only access to the volume. If you specify false, the container can write to the volume. By default, the value is false.
